name: Akatsuki no Amaneka to Aoi Kyojin: Pashiate Bunmei Kenkyuukai Koubouki
summary: Amaneka is a student of the Empire Junior Academy. Everyone in the country is excited because the 1st International Exhibition will be held there soon. Students of the Empire Junior Academy are excited as well. Only one club can take part in it, so students are now busy preparing for it. Amaneka and her friends also set out on an adventure for a secret treasure....

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: 工画堂スタジオ『暁のアマネカと蒼い巨神』デモムービー
